weapon.Buff_BowIce_Level1_2_des: Each stack adds 8% damage. The effect can be stacked up to 3 times and lasts for 15 seconds.
weapon.Buff_BowIce_Level1_2_des_OS: Each stack adds 5% damage. The effect can be stacked up to 3 times and lasts for 15 seconds.
weapon.Buff_BowIce_Level1_des: Grant a stack of Sharp Arrow each time the arrow fired by a Dodge attack hits a target. Each stack increases damage by 8% for 15 seconds. Stack up to 3 times.
weapon.Buff_BowIce_Level3_des: Launching a Dodge attack fires 3 Charged Arrows.
weapon.Buff_BowIce_Level5_des: Double duration of Arrow Rain and slow targets by 25%.
weapon.Buff_BowIce_Level6_2_des: Each stack adds 8% damage. The effect can be stacked up to 5 times and lasts for 15 seconds.
weapon.Buff_BowIce_Level6_2_des_OS: Each stack adds 5% damage. The effect can be stacked up to 5 times and lasts for 15 seconds.
weapon.Buff_BowIce_Level6_des: Sharp Arrow stacks up to 5 times. Hitting a target with a Charged Arrow immediately grants 3 stacks. Headshots grant 5 stacks.
weapon.Buff_BowIce_SSR_Level0_1_des: Sharp Arrow II: Increase final damage by 4% for 15 seconds. Stack up to 3 times.
weapon.Buff_BowIce_level1_des_OS: Grant a stack of Sharp Arrow each time the arrow fired by a Dodge attack hits a target. Each stack increases damage by 5% for 15 seconds. Stack up to 3 times.
